name: Dangerous Guy 2: Ascent
description:
Dangerous Guy or Opasniy Postik is 2D shooter games, based on famous russian meme from early 2010s, movies like Brigada and Bummer and Max Payne video game. 

press SPACE during intro screen to start playing

holding  SHIFT - bullet time

LMB - shoot

W - jump
A - left
D - right
S - crouch 

E - pick up
